DataElement.preferredName: I-PSS 1 Past Week How Often Have Sensation of Not Emptying Bladder Completely after Finish Urinating Score 6 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation over the past week, of how often they had a sensation of not emptying their bladder completely after they finished urinating, using a 6 point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: International Prostate Symptom Score Past Week How Often Have Sensation of Not Emptying Bladder Completely after Finish Urinating Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A screening tool used to screen for, diagnose, track, and manage the symptoms of benign prostatic hyperplasia._The most recent week. May include the present day._A question about how often an individual has or had a sensation of not emptying their bladder completely after they finished urinating._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A screening tool used to screen for, diagnose, track, and manage the symptoms of benign prostatic hyperplasia.

Concepts.definition: A screening tool used to screen for, diagnose, track, and manage the symptoms of benign prostatic hyperplasia.

Property.preferredName: Past Week How Often Have Sensation of Not Emptying Bladder Completely after Finish Urinating Score
Property.preferredDefinition: The most recent week. May include the present day.:A question about how often an individual has or had a sensation of not emptying their bladder completely after they finished urinating.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: The most recent week. May include the present day.

Concepts.longName: How Often Have Sensation of Not Emptying Bladder Completely after Finish Urinating
Concepts.definition: A question about how often an individual has or had a sensation of not emptying their bladder completely after they finished urinating.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire designed to help men determine how bothersome their benign prostatic hyperplasia urinary symptoms are and to determine how effective their treatment is._An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A natural number greater than 4 and less than 6 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of four and one.

Concepts.definition: A natural number greater than 4 and less than 6 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of four and one.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A natural number greater than 3 and less than 5 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of three and one.

Concepts.definition: A natural number greater than 3 and less than 5 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of three and one.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A natural number greater than 1 and less than 3 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of one and one.

Concepts.definition: A natural number greater than 1 and less than 3 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of one and one.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A natural number greater than 2 and less than 4 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of two and one.

Concepts.definition: A natural number greater than 2 and less than 4 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of two and one.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that something happens or happened less than one in five times.

Concepts.longName: Less than One Time in Five
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that something happens or happened less than one in five times.
A subjective answer of no agreement or ability.

An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.

ValueDomain.origin: AUASI:American Urological Association Symptom Index for Benign Prostatic Hyperplasia, Barry, M.J., et.al., The Journal of Urology, Vol. 148, 1549-1557, Nov. 1992
ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created for CCR study 17C0153 in C3D. mc

ReferenceDocuments.name: Over the past week, how often
ReferenceDocuments.description: Over the past week, how often have you had a sensation of not emptying your bladder completely after you finished urinating?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Using PRO/HRQoL Measures
ReferenceDocuments.description: This data element is part of a full set of items that comprise a PRO/HRQoL measure. The full set must be used without any changes to the questions or value set in order to retain the validity and reliability associated with the measure. Changes may not be made to these documents. In cases where retaining the question set intact to preserve the validity and reliability are not as important as advancing the science, questions may be used individually or in combination with other measure questions.

DataElement.changeDescription: Created for Alliance per K. Laumann - smt
